death_place.zh-cn: 北京市中国人民解放军总医院
death_place.en: General Hospital of the People's Liberation Army, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的主要领导人之一，无产阶级革命家、军事家。中国共产党和中华人民共和国的政治及军事人物，曾任党和国家领导人（副国级）。1955年被授予大将军衔，位列开国十大大将之首。
description.en: A major leader of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, a proletarian revolutionary, and an outstanding military strategist. He was a political and military figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a former deputy national-level leader. He was awarded the rank of General in 1955, ranking first among the ten founding generals.

en: Chief of the General Staff of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部的负责人职务。
description.en: The position of head of the General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事科学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军事科学研究机构。
description.en: The military science research institute of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、军事家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, and military strategist. He was the main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕的妻子，原名詹永珠，曾为新四军战士。
description.en: Wife of Su Yu, original name Zhan Yongzhu, a former soldier of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕长子，中国人民解放军中将，曾任北京军区副司令员。
description.en: Eldest son of Su Yu, a lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army, and former deputy commander of the Beijing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕次子，曾在中国远洋公司任职。
description.en: Second son of Su Yu, formerly worked at China Ocean Shipping Company (COSCO).

description.zh-cn: 粟裕之女，陈毅之子陈小鲁的妻子。
description.en: Daughter of Su Yu and wife of Chen Xiaolu, son of Chen Yi.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅元帅之子，粟裕女儿粟惠宁的丈夫。
description.en: Son of Marshal Chen Yi and husband of Su Huining, daughter of Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。曾长期与粟裕共同指挥华东野战军。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He commanded the East China Field Army alongside Su Yu for a long period.

nodes.id: 湖南省立第二师范学院

zh-cn: 湖南省立第二师范学院

description.zh-cn: 位于常德的师范学校，粟裕曾在此就读。
description.en: A normal school in Changde where Su Yu studied.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在土地革命战争时期领导的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Agrarian Revolutionary War.

nodes.id: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

zh-cn: 国民革命军陆军新编第四军

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由中国共产党领导的、活动于华中地区的武装力量。
description.en: An armed force led by the Communist Party of China, active in Central China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党针对中国国民党的分共政策而发起的武装起义，被认为是中共独立领导武装斗争和创建革命军队的开始。
description.en: An armed rebellion launched by the Communist Party of China against the Kuomintang's anti-communist policy, considered the beginning of the CPC's independent leadership of armed struggle and the creation of a revolutionary army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战“三大战役”之一，由粟裕提出并主要指挥，华东野战军和中原野战军共同参与，是中国人民解放军伤亡最重，歼敌数量最多，政治影响最深远、战争样式最复杂的战役。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' of the Chinese Civil War, proposed and primarily commanded by Su Yu, with participation from the East China Field Army and the Central Plains Field Army. It was the campaign with the heaviest casualties for the PLA, the largest number of enemy forces annihilated, the most profound political impact, and the most complex style of warfare.

en: 1958 Enlarged Meeting of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在中国共产党中央军事委员会扩大会议上，粟裕、刘伯承等人因所谓的“教条主义”和“资产阶级个人主义”而受到错误批判。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China, Su Yu, Liu Bocheng, and others were wrongly criticized for alleged 'dogmatism' and 'bourgeois individualism'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。曾是毛泽东指定的接班人。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He was once designated as Mao Zedong's successor.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, and former Chief of the General Staff of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国最高领导人之一。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, and one of the paramount leaders of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, politician, military strategist, and diplomat. The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army, a Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央主席和中共中央总书记。
description.en: A major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第三代中央领导集体的核心，曾任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: The core of the third generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，上将军衔，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央军委副主席。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army with the rank of admiral, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，上将军衔，曾任中央军委副主席。曾长期与粟裕共事。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army with the rank of general, who served as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He worked with Su Yu for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期中国人民解放军的主力部队之一，由陈毅任司令员兼政委，粟裕任副司令员。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Chinese Civil War, with Chen Yi as commander and political commissar, and Su Yu as deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战末期和中华人民共和国初期中国人民解放军的主力部队之一，由华东野战军改编而成。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the late Chinese Civil War and the early PRC, formed from the reorganization of the East China Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，华东野战军在山东蒙阴孟良崮地区对国民革命军整编第七十四师进行的进攻作战。
description.en: An offensive operation conducted by the East China Field Army against the KMT's Reorganized 74th Division in the Menglianggu area of Mengyin, Shandong, during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军高级将领，整编第七十四师师长，在孟良崮战役中阵亡。
description.en: A high-ranking general of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China, commander of the Reorganized 74th Division, who was killed in the Menglianggu Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军高级将领，第七兵团司令官，在淮海战役中阵亡。
description.en: A high-ranking general of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China, commander of the 7th Army Group, who was killed in the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕于1926年11月加入中国共产主义青年团，次年转入中国共产党。
description.en: Su Yu joined the Communist Youth League of China in November 1926 and transferred to the Communist Party of China the following year.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋长

description.zh-cn: 粟裕于1954年10月被任命为中国人民解放军总参谋长，1958年8月被免职。
description.en: Su Yu was appointed Chief of the General Staff of the People's Liberation Army in October 1954 and was dismissed from the post in August 1958.

description.zh-cn: 自1928年井冈山会师后，粟裕长期在毛泽东的领导下工作。在担任总参谋长期间，毛泽东是军委主席。
description.en: Since the meeting at Jinggangshan in 1928, Su Yu worked under the leadership of Mao Zedong for a long time. While serving as Chief of the General Staff, Mao Zedong was the Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

position.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会副委员长
position.en: Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 粟裕担任全国人大常委会副委员长期间，叶剑英是委员长。
description.en: While Su Yu served as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, Ye Jianying was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕与楚青于1941年12月26日结婚。
description.en: Su Yu and Chu Qing married on December 26, 1941.

description.zh-cn: 粟戎生是粟裕的长子。
description.en: Su Rongsheng is the eldest son of Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 粟寒生是粟裕的次子。
description.en: Su Hansheng is the second son of Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 粟惠宁是粟裕的女儿。
description.en: Su Huining is the daughter of Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕之女粟惠宁于1975年与陈毅之子陈小鲁结婚。
description.en: Su Huining, daughter of Su Yu, married Chen Xiaolu, son of Chen Yi, in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 陈小鲁是陈毅元帅的儿子。
description.en: Chen Xiaolu is the son of Marshal Chen Yi.

relationships.target: 湖南省立第二师范学院

description.zh-cn: 1925年春，粟裕考入位于常德的湖南省立第二师范学校。
description.en: In the spring of 1925, Su Yu was admitted to the Hunan Provincial Second Normal School in Changde.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕参加了南昌起义，担任前敌委员会的警卫队班长。
description.en: Su Yu participated in the Nanchang Uprising, serving as a squad leader in the guard unit of the Front Committee.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕与陈毅在井冈山时期相识，并在第二次国共内战期间长期共同指挥华东野战军（第三野战军）。
description.en: Su Yu and Chen Yi met during the Jinggangshan period and co-commanded the East China Field Army (Third Field Army) for a long time during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕在华东野战军组建后担任副司令员，负责战役指挥。
description.en: After the formation of the East China Field Army, Su Yu served as deputy commander, responsible for campaign command.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕指挥华东野战军发起孟良崮战役，全歼国民党军精锐整编第七十四师。
description.en: Su Yu commanded the East China Field Army to launch the Menglianggu Campaign, completely annihilating the elite KMT Reorganized 74th Division.

description.zh-cn: 国民党军整编第七十四师师长张灵甫在孟良崮战役中阵亡。
description.en: Zhang Lingfu, commander of the KMT Reorganized 74th Division, was killed in the Menglianggu Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕于济南战役结束后立即提出进行淮海战役的计划，并在战役中担任主要指挥员，对战役的胜利起了决定性作用。毛泽东评价其“立了第一功”。
description.en: Immediately after the Jinan Campaign, Su Yu proposed the plan for the Huaihai Campaign and served as the main commander, playing a decisive role in the victory. Mao Zedong credited him with 'the first merit'.

description.zh-cn: 国民党军第七兵团司令官黄百韬在淮海战役碾庄战斗中兵败阵亡。
description.en: Huang Baitao, commander of the KMT 7th Army Group, was defeated and killed in the Battle of Nianzhuang during the Huaihai Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的军委扩大会议上，粟裕受到错误的批判，被扣上“资产阶级个人主义”的帽子，并因此被免去总参谋长职务，长期受到不公正对待。
description.en: At the 1958 enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, Su Yu was wrongly criticized, labeled a 'bourgeois individualist', and was subsequently dismissed from his post as Chief of the General Staff, facing unfair treatment for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的军委扩大会议上，彭德怀等人对粟裕进行了批判。
description.en: At the 1958 enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, Peng Dehuai and others criticized Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的军委扩大会议上，林彪等人对粟裕进行了批判。
description.en: At the 1958 enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, Lin Biao and others criticized Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的军委扩大会议上，聂荣臻等人对粟裕进行了批判。
description.en: At the 1958 enlarged meeting of the Central Military Commission, Nie Rongzhen and others criticized Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平主持了批判粟裕的元帅会议。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping presided over the meeting of marshals that criticized Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 在粟裕提出申诉后，叶剑英于1979年批示要求总政治部研究处理1958年对粟裕的错误批判，开启了为粟裕平反的进程。
description.en: After Su Yu submitted his appeal, Ye Jianying instructed in 1979 that the General Political Department should investigate and handle the wrongful criticism of Su Yu in 1958, initiating the process of his rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 刘华清与张震联名发表经江泽民批发的文章《追忆粟裕同志》，正式为粟裕在1958年受到的错误批判平反，并代表中央军委表明了意见。
description.en: Liu Huaqing and Zhang Zhen jointly published the article 'Recalling Comrade Su Yu', approved by Jiang Zemin, which officially rehabilitated Su Yu from the wrongful criticism he received in 1958 and expressed the opinion of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张震与刘华清联名发表经江泽民批发的文章《追忆粟裕同志》，正式为粟裕在1958年受到的错误批判平反，并代表中央军委表明了意见。
description.en: Zhang Zhen and Liu Huaqing jointly published the article 'Recalling Comrade Su Yu', approved by Jiang Zemin, which officially rehabilitated Su Yu from the wrongful criticism he received in 1958 and expressed the opinion of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民作为时任中央军委主席，批准发表了为粟裕平反的文章《追忆粟裕同志》，最终完成了对粟裕的平反。
description.en: As the then Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Jiang Zemin approved the publication of the article 'Recalling Comrade Su Yu', which rehabilitated Su Yu, thus finalizing his rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 黄克诚接替粟裕担任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: Huang Kecheng succeeded Su Yu as the Chief of the General Staff of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 粟裕接替聂荣臻（代总参谋长）担任中国人民解放军总参谋长。
description.en: Su Yu succeeded Nie Rongzhen (acting Chief of the General Staff) as the Chief of the General Staff of the People's Liberation Army.
